Sentencas: The performances of Solid Oxide Cells (SOCs) are controlled by key microstructural properties such as the density of Triple Phase Boundary lengths (TPBI) and the interfacial specific surface areas (S-i/j).
Titulo: Microstructural correlations for specific surface area and triple phase boundary length for composite electrodes of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: These electrode properties are dependent on basic morphological parameters defined by the phase volume fractions and the Particle Size Distributions (PSD) of the percolated solid phases.
Titulo: Microstructural correlations for specific surface area and triple phase boundary length for composite electrodes of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The understanding of these relationships is of central importance for designing an optimum electrode microstructure.
Titulo: Microstructural correlations for specific surface area and triple phase boundary length for composite electrodes of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: In this study, semi-analytical expressions for the density of TPBI and the interfacial specific surface areas are investigated.
Titulo: Microstructural correlations for specific surface area and triple phase boundary length for composite electrodes of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: For this purpose, a large number of synthetic microstructures are generated by using validated models based on the sphere packing and the truncated Gaussian random field methods.
Titulo: Microstructural correlations for specific surface area and triple phase boundary length for composite electrodes of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The coefficients of the parametric equations for both investigated properties (TPBI density and S-i/j) are fitted on the large database generated.
Titulo: Microstructural correlations for specific surface area and triple phase boundary length for composite electrodes of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The predictions of the micro structural correlations are in good agreement with the parameters directly computed on 3D reconstructions of typical LSCF-CGO and Ni-YSZ electrodes, thereby validating their reliability.
Titulo: Microstructural correlations for specific surface area and triple phase boundary length for composite electrodes of solid oxide cells
